column4: Hey all.  I'm having issues installing xmms.  I tried using "sudo apt-get install xmms" but that can't find the pkg that I'm requesting.  :(  I've also tried downloading the tarbal, except that when I run the .configure cmd it barks about glib, which I just installed.
I had luck manually compiling it
why not just use vlc or another crispy native player
me too ;]   a long time ago
